title: Rough Patch
description: Originally included in Blue Colla Make Ya Holla Box SetJagger and BiancaMechanic and TeacherLaid back and FieryLove isn't easy. Sometimes it isn't patient, sometimes it isn't kind, but there's one thing that will make you appreciate your significant other. The way they make you feel when you come though the other side of a rough patch.
author: Laramie Briscoe
